#include "iostream"
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t, n;
	cin >> t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin >> n;
		int flag = 0;
		for(int i = 0; i < n; i++)
		{
			int a = i;
			int sum = 0;
			while(a > 0)
			{
				int m = a%10;
				sum += m;
				a /= 10;
			}
			sum += i;
			if(sum == n)
			{
				cout << i << endl;
				flag = 1;
				break;
			}
			if(flag == 1)
				break;
		}
		if(!flag)
			cout << "NONE" << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
